A unique property in the heart of Dandenong!
This is the kind of opportunity that doesn't come along very often. Boasting a first-class location just moments from the vibrant heart of Dandenong, this outstanding find is perfect for a savvy investor, developer or renovator. Consisting of a north-facing Californian bungalow and two detached units, the potential here is immense!
Occupying an expansive 626m2 block,12 Ronald Street showcases a solid brick façade, generous front yard and long driveway. As you step inside via the covered porch, you're greeted by a fantastic layout and several standout features, including high ceilings, decorative tiling, ornate cornices, polished timber-look flooring and beautiful stained-glass windows. This home has true character!

You'll also enjoy a garden shed, off-street parking and a large rearyard.
Positioned close to the Eastlink and within walking distance of Dandenong Plaza, Dandenong Station, Dandenong Hospital, the Chisholm Institute of TAFE, several schools and stunning parkland, you couldn't ask for a better location.
